reviews.review:
The Empire Strikes back of the MCU!
PROS:
- Amazing storyline
- Best MCU villain of all time, Thanos, played by Josh Brolin
- Character interactions
- Great acting
- Emotional moments
- Kick Ass action
- Crazy ending
- Structurally different from the other movies
- Rewards fans for watching all the other movies
CONS:
- Pacing of the film
- Forgettable Black Order (except for Ebony Maw)
- Minor CGI issues
- Final battle should've lasted much longer

 Overall I really loved this movie and the Russo brothers almost nailed it!
The most thrilling, epic, and adventurous movie I have ever seen. Job well done Marvel! Acting is terrific and so is the emotion. A must see for any fan of cinema!
It was amazing. It perefectly wrapped up the mcu and will leave viewers dying to see part 2
This movie is the best movie I have seen for this century... I am one of he fan of Action Si-fi movie ??. I hope Marvel fans will really like to see this film

Avengers, Infinity War is a great movie. If you love action, you'll get action! It's not all action, though. There are some great emotional scenes that really hit the viewers. The battles are GREAT and Thanos is such an interesting character. I love him so much. Marvel did a great job. I DONT KNOW WHY THIS MOVIE HAS A LESSER SCORE THAN TGE LAST JEDI. The last Jedi was just ok. But it receives a 91?!?! What an outrage! And this movie is so good! It at least deserves a 90! Overall, Avengers Infinity War is probably my favorite Marvel movie. I might need to watch it again. It's just that good!

100% THE BEST MARVEL MOVIE. THE STORY AND PLOT WAS NEAR PERFECT. THE ACTION, ACTING AND PACE WAS SPOT ON. I KID YOU NOW WHEN I SAY EXCEEDED EXPECTATIONS ON ALL ACCOUNTS. GO SEE THIS MOVIE, IT IS A TREAT FOR YOUR MIND AND SPECTACAL FOR YOUR EYES.

FAMILY FRIENDLY AND FUN. I CAN NOT WAIT FOR THE NEXT ONE - UNBELIEVEABLE. 

RATING SHOULD BE 100% (AND I SO RARELY GIVE REVIEWS, MAYBE 2 IN MY LIFETIME) ... THIS ONE WAS WORTH IT  AND THEY NEED TO KNOW! 

GO SEE IT, BUY THE TICKET NOW - YOU WILL NOT REGRET IT. 

IF YOU ARE A MARVEL FAN... OMG YOU ARE IN FOR A TREAT. 10 YEARS LEADING UP TO THIS. WHEN YOU SIT DOWN TO WATCH THIS MOVIE, REALIZE THAT YOU ARE ABOUT TO WATCH SOMETHING THAT YOU WILL NEVER FORGET. 

THIS IS AN INVESTMENT THAT PAY HUGE RETURNS, THIS IS AN EXPERIENCE. GET READY TO JUMP IN YOUR SEAT WITH EXCITEMENT AND CRY WITH ANTICIPATION. YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED. - THIS IS 10 YEARS LEADING UP TO THIS... DISNEY/MARVEL HAVE BEGUN PERFECTING THE MOVIE EXPERIENCE AS WELL... NOW ITS TIME FOR YOU TO FEEL IT.
Surprising, funny and full of action. Thanos is the villain the MCU needed

One of the most ambitious franchises and films of all time, following its higher stake predecessors, Infinity War is a roller coaster of amazing visuals, action and emotion. Marvel wants you to see this on the biggest screen possible and it's worth doing so, as the massive set pieces fill the screen with great scope and inventive thrills that build on what has been built from its previous movies.  The collaboration behind these movies are one of the films strongest aspects as the filmmakers play with the established traits and worlds of other movies, making previous films even more essential viewing, so there will be those feeling left out as this is a big love letter to the fans. Massive set pieces use the powers and abilities of our heroes so creatively they very much deserve the cheers and smiles they are sure to trigger. The Russo Brothers do a good job of giving us insight and plenty of screen time with the menacing villain who genuinely garners fear in the scenes he faces our heroes in. The massive cast all get their moments, with even the new villainous henchman getting valid inclusions, which are a lot of fun. The massive set of heroes inevitably means some will have lesser parts than others (some more surprising than others) which also means while they do all get some emotional payoffs we don't get the full character arcs previous films did greats jobs at building. The story is light but like a big TV show finale, Infinity War ticks its plot points off one by one as it pulls out all the stops with gasps and big story turns that are sure to keep fans coming for at least its next big three projects.
makes you want too see the end.
Super Heroes not my favourite genre but it was quite funny and I love Robert Downey Jnr and of course some eye candy Chris Hemsworth ??
